official-title.#text: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to observe a moment of silence in the House on the first legislative day of each month for those killed or wounded in the United States engagement in Afghanistan.

cosponsor.#tail: ) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text: That rule XIV of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

On the first legislative day of each month on which there is a record vote on any bill or joint resolution, immediately after that vote, a moment of silence shall be observed on behalf of those killed or wounded (as well as their families) in the current United States engagement in Afghanistan.

text.#text: The moment of silence shall be led by the
